for _ in range(int(input())):
    line = input().strip().split()
    n = int(line[0])
    m = int(line[1])
    total = 0
    i = n // m
    j = n % m
    total += i * i * (m - 1)
    total += i * (i - 1)
    if m % 2 == 0:
        total -= i
    total = total // 2
    total += i * j
    if j > m // 2:
        total += j - m // 2
    print(total)
